# homeWithSimilarNameExists

**Type Property**

An attempt to assign a home the same name as an existing home.

## Declaration

```swift
static var homeWithSimilarNameExists: HMError.Code { get }
```

## Detecting collision errors

- **objectWithSimilarNameExists**: An object with a similar name already exists.
- **objectWithSimilarNameExistsInHome**: An attempt to give the name of one object to another object in the home.
- **renameWithSimilarName**: An attempt to rename an object with its current name.
